titleStmt.title: An honest mans delight: or Knavery made known. When truth and honesty are joyn'd together ... To the tune of, I'le hold thee five shillings.
titleStmt.author: T. J.

notesStmt.note: Contains title ornament and 2 woodcut illustrations.
Date range suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
